sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_notification_preference</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Check duplicate notification preferences</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { var duplicateGr = new GlideRecord('sys_notification_preference'); duplicateGr.addQuery("recipient_table", current.recipient_table); duplicateGr.addQuery("recipient", current.recipient); duplicateGr.addQuery("destination_table", current.destination_table); duplicateGr.addQuery("destination", current.destination); duplicateGr.addQuery("destination_identifier_field", current.destination_identifier_field); duplicateGr.addQuery("notification", current.notification); if (current.operation() == 'update') duplicateGr.addQuery("sys_id", "!=", current.sys_id); duplicateGr.query(); if (duplicateGr.next()) { gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage("This notification preference already exists")); current.setAbortAction(true); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-07-27 18:07:13</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>1c64a24153121010ece0ddeeff7b126f</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Check duplicate notification preferences</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Notification Providers" source="com.glide.notification.provider">e5887ca03cf1311068bcf327dfe37f57</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_1c64a24153121010ece0ddeeff7b126f</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-08-03 18:20:50</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1c64a24153121010ece0ddeeff7b126f"/> </record_update>
